content.p: We support more than 8,000 postgraduates, 3,000 researchers and 160 research groups. Join us. Supporting early career researchers through our prestigious research fellowship schemes. Our research degrees range from masters degrees to doctoral work â€“ be part of our world. Work alongside internationally acclaimed researchers and unlock your potential. We are committed to supporting the ongoing development of our researchers and support staff. Clinical Scholar Silver Awards form the second stage on the Department of Health's Clinical Academic Training Pathway within the East Midlands. Wellcome Prime scholarships aim to support the most productive and innovative early career researchers at Nottingham. Our international community of staff and students are at the heart of our university. We can offer support and guidance to individuals moving to Nottingham.
